mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.p_name AS "pname", a.p_point AS "ppoint", (select f.name from sys_upload_file f where f.id = a.upload_file_id ) AS "uploadFile.name", (select f.abso_path from sys_upload_file f where f.id = a.upload_file_id ) AS "uploadFile.absoPath", (select f.rela_path from sys_upload_file f where f.id = a.upload_file_id ) AS "uploadFile.relaPath", (select f.id from sys_upload_file f where f.id = a.upload_file_id ) AS "uploadFile.id"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO point_goods( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, p_name, p_point, upload_file_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{pname}, #{ppoint}, #{uploadFile.id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE point_goods SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, p_name = #{pname}, p_point = #{ppoint}, upload_file_id = #{uploadFile.id} WHERE id = #{id}
